EmailTemplate.name: Vets Prevail Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Vets Prevail Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName},
Now that the holidays are behind us all, I'd like to remind you about IAVA's partnership with Vets Prevail.
We are looking to you, a member at IAVA, to help test this new innovative online program. It is quick, easy, and you could even earn $150 for your time and participation.
If you've already signed up we would encourage you to check your email, including SPAM folders, for important information from the Vets Prevail team. And if you haven't heard from them in a while feel free to reply to this email, and we'll put you back in touch.
As a reminder, once you register you only have one month to complete the program so don't delay. Visit - http://iava.org/vetsprevail.
This is a one-of-a-kind program and opportunity and we don't want anyone to miss out.
Happy New Year,
Jason -- Jason Hansman Senior Program Manager Iraq and Afghanistan Veterans of America
